rocks.bastion.core.resource

Class UnreadableResourceException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • rocks.bastion.core.resource.InvalidResourceException
            • rocks.bastion.core.resource.UnreadableResourceException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class UnreadableResourceException
extends InvalidResourceException
    Thrown by the ResourceLoader when it attempts to load a resource which exists but cannot be read. This can be, for example, a file path which points to a directory or a file which the user does not have permissions to read.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnreadableResourceException(String source)
      Constructs an instance of this exception given the the source path which the ResourceLoader tried to load.

        public UnreadableResourceException(String source)
        Constructs an instance of this exception given the the source path which the ResourceLoader tried to load.
        Parameters:
        source - The path supplied by the user which could not be loaded.
